hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa`d who said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) passed by me when I was supplicating with my fingers and he said: 'Make it one, make it one' and pointed with his forefinger

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الإِشَارَةِ، بِأُصْبُعَيْنِ وَبِأَىِّ أُصْبُعٍ يُشِيرُ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of pointing with two fingers and with which finger one should point
